closeShortWithUserNft((uint256,uint256,u.details: user should approve this contract for Uni NFT transfer

flashloanWMintDepositNft((uint256,uint25.details: sender can specify the amount of ETH collateral to withdraw in case vault.collateralAmount > ETH to repay for loan

flashswapSellLongWMint((uint256,uint256,.details: flashswap amount = collateral amount - msg.value - ETH from selling long wPowerPerp

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: accept erc721 from safeTransferFrom and safeMint after callback

params._collateralToFlashloan: collateral amount to flashloan and deposit into vault to be able to withdraw Uni LP NFT

params._data: callback data encoded as SwapCallbackData struct

batchMintLp((address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: mint WPowerPerp and LP into Uniswap v3 pool

closeShortWithUserNft((uint256,uint256,u.notice: close short position with user Uniswap v3 LP NFT

flashloanWMintDepositNft((uint256,uint25.notice: FLash mint short position, LP in Uni v3, use LP NFT as collateral and withdraw ETH collateral to repay flashloan

flashswapSellLongWMint((uint256,uint256,.notice: sell long wPowerPerp and flashswap mint short position

flashswapWBurnBuyLong((uint256,uint256,u.notice: flash close position and buy long squeeth

rebalanceVaultNft(uint256,uint256,(uint8.notice: Rebalance, increase and decrease LP liquidity through minting/burning wPowerPerp in vault

sellAll((uint256,uint256,uint128,uint128.notice: sell all LP wPowerPerp amounts to WETH and send back to user

uniswapV3SwapCallback(int256,int256,byte.notice: uniswap swap callback function for flashswap

userdoc.notice: Error code E0: user not allowed to operate vault E1: max ETH to pay for long wPowerPerp is less than amount available E2: ETH sent is less than amount to use for minting short plus amount to use for LPing E3: amount out less than min E4: amont in greater than max E5: invalid factory address E6: invalid assets length
